availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Malinda Kibbey. Father of William Kibbey, Harriet Kibbey, John Kibbey, George Thomas Kibbey, Samuel F. Kibbey, Francis M. Kibbey, James H. Kibbey, Mildred Kibbey, Amanda Kibbey, Malinda Kibbey, and Eli J. Kibbey. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 219A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 199.
Find A Grave, "Jacob Kibbey (1803-1870)," Memorial #37084917, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/37084917 (accessed January 10, 2020).
